Created an attachment (id=2972)
Java file used to reproduce problem with debugger

Fixed.
The problem was not with static final array, but with large array ( > 100 entries).
In this case the JDIArrayValue#getVariables() no more return
JDIArrayEntryVariable, but JDIArrayPartition. The implementation of
ArrayAccess#execute() didn't manage this case.

Changes in ArrayAccess and JDIArrayPartition.
